trans-unit.source: An abstract container class that, when implemented by several of its static properties, contains version information for security components.
trans-unit.target: 一個抽象容器類別，當它的數個靜態屬性實作它時，此類別會包含安全性元件的版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: This class is the extensibility point for customizing token serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此類別是自訂權杖序列化的擴充點。

trans-unit.source: This class is a singleton that provides information about the versions of the security specifications, (WS-Security, WS-Trust, WS-Secure Conversation and WS-Security Policy), that must be supported by a binding.
trans-unit.target: 此類別是一個 singleton，提供繫結必須支援的安全性規格 (WS-Security、WS-Trust、WS-Secure Conversation 與 WS-Security Policy) 的版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The class contains seven `static` properties, each of which returns an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 此類別包含七個 `static` 屬性，每個屬性都會傳回一個本類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Each of these properties represents a different combination of security specification versions.
trans-unit.target: 每個屬性都代表不同的安全性規格版本組合。

trans-unit.source: The instances of this class are used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體會在 `Create…CertificateBindingElement` 類別上當做 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 方法呼叫內的參數使用。

trans-unit.source: If you pass the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.Default%2A> property, you create a standard version of the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 若傳入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion.Default%2A> 屬性，便會建立一個標準版本的繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: To create a non-standard version, pass the property that matches your version.
trans-unit.target: 若意見立非標準版，請傳入符合您的版本的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The class also contains `abstract` properties that are implemented by the previous instances.
trans-unit.target: 此類別亦包含 `abstract` 屬性，前述執行個體會實作此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version information for the Basic Security Profile.
trans-unit.target: 取得 Basic Security Profile 的版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.BasicSecurityProfileVersion" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.BasicSecurityProfileVersion" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
trans-unit.target: 七個靜態屬性傳回之這個類別的執行個體會實作此方法。

trans-unit.source: Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions, and so returns a different value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 由於每個實作都代表不同的規格版本組合，所以會針對此屬性傳回不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the version information for default message security.
trans-unit.target: 取得預設訊息安全性的版本資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> object that represents the default message security.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> 物件，表示預設訊息安全性。

trans-unit.source: The default security specifications are WS-Security 1.1, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 預設安全性規格為 WS-Security 1.1、WS-Trust of February 2005、WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 與 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1。

trans-unit.source: This static property returns an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個靜態屬性會傳回這個類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The instance of this class is used as parameters in the `Create…CertificateBindingElement` method calls on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的執行個體會在 `Create…CertificateBindingElement` 類別上當做 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> 方法呼叫內的參數使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the WS-SecureConversation version that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應於訊息安全性版本的 WS-SecureConversation 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecureConversationVersion" /> object that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecureConversationVersion" /> 物件，對應至訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
trans-unit.target: 七個靜態屬性傳回之這個類別的執行個體會實作此方法。

trans-unit.source: Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 由於每個實作都代表不同的規格版本組合，所以會針對此屬性傳回不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the WS-SecurityPolicy version that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應於訊息安全性版本的 WS-SecurityPolicy 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityPolicyVersion" /> object that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityPolicyVersion" /> 物件，對應至訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
trans-unit.target: 七個靜態屬性傳回之這個類別的執行個體會實作此方法。

trans-unit.source: Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 由於每個實作都代表不同的規格版本組合，所以會針對此屬性傳回不同的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the security token version that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應於訊息安全性版本的安全性權杖版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion" /> object that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion" /> 物件，對應至訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented by the instances of this class returned by the seven static properties.
trans-unit.target: 七個靜態屬性傳回之這個類別的執行個體會實作此方法。

trans-unit.source: Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 由於每個實作都代表不同的規格版本組合，所以會針對此屬性傳回不同的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to query a token serializer factory interface defined in <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion> for a token serializer instance capable of serializing tokens.
trans-unit.target: 本屬性用來查詢 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion>中定義的權杖序列化程式處理站介面，以取得權杖序列化程式執行個體，進行權杖序列化。

trans-unit.source: Gets the WS-Security version that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: 取得對應於訊息安全性版本的 WS-Security 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityVersion" /> object that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityVersion" /> 物件，對應至訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.target: 取得對應於訊息安全性版本的 WS-Trust 版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.TrustVersion" /> object that corresponds to the message security version.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.TrustVersion" /> 物件，對應至訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: Each implementation represents a different combination of specification versions and so returns a different value for this property.

trans-unit.source: Gets the message security version that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.
trans-unit.target: 取得要求 Basic Security Profile 1.0 (採用 WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust 1.3、WS-SecureConversation 1.3 與 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 安全性規格) 的訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> object that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 security specifications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> 物件，要求 Basic Security Profile 1.0 (採用 WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust 1.3、WS-SecureConversation 1.3 與 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 安全性規格)。

trans-unit.target: 這個靜態屬性會傳回這個類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 取得要求 Basic Security Profile 1.0 (採用 WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust of February 2005、WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 與 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 安全性規格) 的訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> object that requires the Basic Security Profile 1.0 based on WS-Security 1.0, WS-Trust of February 2005, WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 and WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 security specifications.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityVersion" /> 物件，要求 Basic Security Profile 1.0 (採用 WS-Security 1.0、WS-Trust of February 2005、WS-SecureConversation of February 2005 與 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.1 安全性規格)。

trans-unit.target: 取得要求 WS-Security 1.1、WS-Trust 1.3、WS-SecureConversation 1.3 與 WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 安全性規格的訊息安全性版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message security version that requires the WS-Security1.1, WS-Trust 1.3, WS-SecureConversation 1.3, WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2, and BasicSecurityProfile 1.0 security specifications.
trans-unit.target: 取得要求 WS-Security1.1、WS-Trust 1.3、WS-SecureConversation 1.3、WS-SecurityPolicy 1.2 與 BasicSecurityProfile 1.0 安全性規格的訊息安全性版本。
